common_queries.my_work_items: SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.State], [System.AssignedTo] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.AssignedTo] = @Me AND [System.State] <> 'Closed' ORDER BY [System.ChangedDate] DESC
common_queries.recent_bugs: SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.State] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.WorkItemType] = 'Bug' AND [System.State] = 'Active' ORDER BY [System.CreatedDate] DESC
common_queries.active_prs: Active pull requests assigned to me or created by me
